alert.note: Alert for Greenwood (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 7:31AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Greenwood County through 800 AM EST... At 731 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Greenwood, or 7 miles northeast of Troy, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Greenwood, Ninety Six, Troy, Ninety Six Historic Site, Promised Land, Bradley, Kirksey, Dyson, Callison and Epworth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
